EmailTemplate.description: Send from Training Event to any one assigned a Learning Plan Phase I that hasn't completed within 30 days.
EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan Completion Reminder Phase I
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Learning Plan Misses You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Learning Plan is Waiting!
Hi ,
I'm just checking in to see how you're doing on completing your Learning Plan Phase I General Audience https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MSbGdaiqFVx0TLURiBqczsu-LDH7xfCgBSltasuiM8g/copy
Once you've fully reviewed the Learning Plan, take the Knowledge Check (https://forms.gle/3LHkch6p9uajBb38A) to indicate that you've completed this training.
Please let me know any if you have any questions.
Thank You,
{!User.Name} WEX University Global Training
